Jonathan Tsang

I'm a student at the University of Waterloo and I want to code.

Who I Am

I'm a CS student at Waterloo. I'm really interested in web development, game development, and trying out new technologies.

Projects

Check out my projects here

PocketMonitor



Chrome Extension that makes an iframe at the top of Youtube pages that scales to the size of the browser window.

Top Down Shooter



Top down shooter using your mouse to aim and spacebar to shoot zombies with 6 weapons.

BomberAI



Basic Bomberman AI made with IBM Watson API.

MyFlaws



Experimental Platformer with 2D physics, collectibles, exploration, inventory, sublevels, and merged game genres.

Ladder Jump



An array based game where you jump over bombs, rotate the array and unlock doors.

Mastermind



Command-line based game where it accepts input and the player must guess the randomized code.
